cartographr 0.2.3
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Package index

Data retrieval and map preprocessing

Functions for obtaining and preparing OpenStreetMap data for urban environments.

get_osmdata()
Retrieve OpenStreetMap Data
preprocess_map()
Preprocess OSM Data
crop()
Crop a preprocessed map

Plotting and customization

Functions to plot maps with custom themes and save the output.

plot_map()
Plot a map with custom palette
save_map()
Save a map to a file
get_palette()
Create a palette for maps

Configuration and settings

Functions to configure the cartography package settings and output.

print_config()
Print configuration details
set_attribution()
Set or get attribution setting
set_output_size()
Set output size for maps

Theming and aesthetics

Functions to apply custom themes and fonts to enhance the visual appeal of maps.

theme_infomap() theme_infomap_anton() theme_infomap_poppins() theme_infomap_cinzel() theme_infomap_barlow()
Apply infomap theme with specified font
theme_poster() theme_poster_poppins() theme_poster_anton() theme_poster_cinzel() theme_poster_barlow()
Create a poster theme

Datasets

Included datasets for demonstration and testing purposes.

crime
Manhattan crime dataset
osm
OSM SoHo New York simple features
soho_boundary
SoHo Boundary Simple Features Vector
